Call Us 0330 053 8620 Email Us heretohelp@brytenenergy.co.uk logo: BrytEnergy • The image displays the logo for "BrytEnergy". • The logo consists of the word "Bryt" in bold black font, immediately followed by "Energy" in a regular, thin black font, with no space between the two words. • All text is in black on a white background. • No additional graphic elements, taglines, or symbols are present. • The logo is horizontally oriented and uses a sans-serif typeface. Analysis : • The use of bold for "Bryt" and regular weight for "Energy" visually separates the two parts of the name, emphasizing "Bryt". • The minimalist, monochrome design suggests a modern and professional brand identity. End Date Of Fixed Price Period: 31-01-22 Please note this is also the final date you can avoid out of contract rates by entering into a new contract with us or switching to another supplier Your Product Name: Pure Certainty Your Product fuel mix: 100% renewable Summary : This image presents two informational icons with accompanying text, explaining the basis for invoice calculations in terms of value and contract. illustration: Value Section : • Icon: Document with pound sign (£) and lines, inside a black circle. • Heading: "Value" • Text: "Your invoice is in line with your previous period" Contract Section : • Icon: Document with a key, inside a black circle. • Heading: "Contract" • Text: "Your invoice is based on contract rates" Layout : • Two sections arranged horizontally, each with an icon, heading, and explanatory text. • Black and white color scheme, sans-serif font. Analysis : • The image visually distinguishes between invoices based on historical value and those based on contract rates, using clear icons and concise text for quick comprehension. Dimensions & Placement : • The logo is horizontally aligned, with no border or background shape. Analysis : • The use of bold for "Bryt" draws attention to the first part of the name, possibly to emphasize brand identity. The clean, monochrome design suggests a modern and professional image. Call Us 0330 053 8620

Email Us heretohelp@brytenenergy.co.uk

logo: BrytEnergy

• The image displays the logo for "BrytEnergy".
• The logo consists of the word "Bryt" in bold black font, immediately followed by "Energy" in a regular, thin black font, with no space between the two words.
• All text is in black on a white background.
• No additional graphic elements, taglines, or symbols are present.
• The logo is horizontally oriented and uses a sans-serif typeface.

Analysis :
• The use of bold for "Bryt" and regular weight for "Energy" visually separates the two parts of the name, emphasizing "Bryt".
• The minimalist, monochrome design suggests a modern and professional brand identity.

Mr Steve Long  
H+S AVIATION LIMITED  
Airport Service Road  
Portsmouth  
PO3 5PJ

Your Account No.: A-0015745
Customer Ref./PO No.: N/A
Invoice No.: I-0136314

Invoice Date: 07-12-21
Page No.: 1 of 2

Summary : This image presents two informational icons with accompanying text, explaining the basis for invoice calculations in terms of value and contract.

illustration:
Value Section :
  • Icon: Document with pound sign (£) and lines, inside a black circle.
  • Heading: "Value"
  • Text: "Your invoice is in line with your previous period"

Contract Section :
  • Icon: Document with a key, inside a black circle.
  • Heading: "Contract"
  • Text: "Your invoice is based on contract rates"

Layout :
  • Two sections arranged horizontally, each with an icon, heading, and explanatory text.
  • Black and white color scheme, sans-serif font.

Analysis :
  • The image visually distinguishes between invoices based on historical value and those based on contract rates, using clear icons and concise text for quick comprehension.

Your Account Summary

Total of This Invoice£21,826.90
Payment will be taken automatically by Direct Debit on or after 21-12-21 Total Amount to Pay £21,826.90

## Important Information

We are committed to providing you with a high level of service.
But if we let you down in any way, please contact us and we'll do all we can to help.
For more information about making a complaint and your dispute rights, please visit www.brytenergy.co.uk/footer/making-a-complaint

Your rota disconnection code can be found under the postcode at the
top of the page. For more information please visit
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/electricity-supply-
emergency-code.
